thread.title: BRIEF-American Express Says K.I. Chenault's 2017 Total Compensation Was $18.6 Mln

title: BRIEF-American Express Says K.I. Chenault's 2017 Total Compensation Was $18.6 Mln
text: March 19, 2018 / 4:18 PM / Updated 23 minutes ago BRIEF-American Express Says K.I. Chenault's 2017 Total Compensation Was $18.6 Mln Reuters Staff 1 Min Read March 19 (Reuters) - American Express Co: * AMERICAN EXPRESS CO K.I. CHENAULT’S 2017 TOTAL COMPENSATION WAS $18.6 MILLION VERSUS $17.5 MILLION IN 2016 – SEC FILING‍​ * AMERICAN EXPRESS - S.J. SQUERI’S 2017 TOTAL COMPENSATION WAS $19.2 MILLION VERSUS $12.3 MILLION IN 2016; SQUERI SUCCEEDED CHENAULT AS CHAIRMAN, CEO ON FEB 1, 2018 * AMERICAN EXPRESS CO SAYS CFO J.C. CAMPBELL'S 2017 TOTAL ANNUAL COMPENSATION WAS $9.6 MILLION VERSUS $8.6 MILLION IN 2016 Source text: ( bit.ly/2IBjvdC ) Further company coverage:
